succ.wallTooFar: This wall is too far away to climb.
succ.missingCups: You need suction cups on all 4 limbs to climb.
succ.obstructed: Climbing here will place you inside a block.
succ.onlyWalls: You can only climb on walls.
succ.notEnoughWall: There isn't enough wall to climb here.
succ.cupObstructedLiquid: Liquid prevents your suction cups from sticking.
succ.cupObstructedBlock: A block is in the way.
succ.cupObstructedOther: Another Suction Cup is in the way.
succ.cupObstructedBadWall: A Suction Cup can't stick to this wall.
